Fried Gyoza.name: Renkon Gyoza (with or without garlic)
Fried Gyoza.description: Fresh lotus roots in the gyoza add a satisfying crunch. Gyoza have a delicious flavor on their own, so please try them without any sauce first.

Fried Gyoza.name: Hatake no Satoimo Gyoza(6pcs)
Fried Gyoza.description: Packed with plenty of taro from Tokorozawa. The dough is infused with komatsuna greens. Enjoy it as is, without any additional seasoning.

Fried Gyoza.name: Premium Gyoza 4pcs (with or without garlic)
Fried Gyoza.description: Handmade gyoza. Fresh lotus roots are in them.

Frozen Gyoza.name: Renkon Gyoza (with or without garlic)
Frozen Gyoza.description: Fresh lotus roots in the gyoza add a satisfying crunch. Gyoza have a delicious flavor on their own, so please try them without any sauce first.

Frozen Gyoza.name: Hatake no Satoimo Gyoza(20pcs)
Frozen Gyoza.description: Packed with plenty of taro from Tokorozawa. The dough is infused with komatsuna greens. Enjoy it as is, without any additional seasoning.

Frozen Gyoza.name: Premium Gyoza 12pcs (with or without garlic)
Frozen Gyoza.description: Handmade gyoza. Fresh lotus roots are in them.

Frozen Sides (All ￥550).name: Renkon no Hasami Yaki
Frozen Sides (All ￥550).description: Ground pork infused with ginger and thickly sliced lotus root create a delightful texture! A dish with incredible crunch. Enjoy with yuzu pepper if you like.

Frozen Sides (All ￥550).name: Healthy Oba (6pcs)
Frozen Sides (All ￥550).description: A healthy dish with chicken and lotus root, wrapped in refreshing shiso leaves. Best enjoyed with ponzu sauce.

Frozen Sides (All ￥550).name: Healthy Daikon (6pcs)
Frozen Sides (All ￥550).description: A healthy dish with chicken and lotus root, wrapped in refreshing daikon. Best enjoyed with ponzu sauce.
